fulltext:
Luu Xuan Trong 
Date of birth: 
Dec 23, 1992 
Gender: 
Male 
Phone:  01244245999 
Email: 
tronglx2312@gmail.com 
Github account: 
Tronglx 
Address: 
Hanoi, Vietnam 
OBJECTIVE 
Take advantages of software development skills, experience and understanding of software development to become a 
professional developer and bring a lot value to Customers. 
EDUCATION 
Sep 2010 - Sep 2015 
Hanoi University of science and technology 
Major: HEDSPI, Information 
system 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Feb 2018 – Present 
Kaopiz Software Company 
Developer 
Main responsibilities: 
- Research blockchain technology and apply to developing information 
system. 
May 2016 – Feb 2018 
FPT Software Company  
Developer 
Main responsibilities: 
- Automotive system development. 
- Communicate with customer, make task list, schedule and make plan 
for do it. 
- Analysis and design system. Make high level design, low level design 
document. 
- Coding and review code of other members. 
- Study and using advanced technology for system. 
- Using QT/QML and C++ skills for system development. 
Oct 2015 – Apr 2016 
Ocean software Viet Nam Company 
Developer 
Main responsibilities: 
- E-commerce system development and maintenance. 
- Using magento CMS to manage content. 
SKILLS 
Language 
English: TOEIC 600. Japanese: Equivalent to N3. 
OS 
Window, linux system. 
Tools 
Office tools, Jira tool, gerrit, git, docker. 
Programming skills 
 C/C++, Go, JavaScript, Solidity, web3.js, truffle framework. 
Blockchain background 
 Having knowledge of Blockchain ecosystem, how blockchain works, consensus 
algorithms (PoW, PoS, PoA ...), Dapp application, p2p protocol, distributed ledger 
technology, lightning network, sidechain, how to create transaction, how to transmit 
transaction to network. 
 Having knowledge of cryptographic, asymmetric crytographic principle, how to create 
hierarchical deterministic (HD) wallet, how to sign transaction, how the ECDSA 
algorithm works, how to verify signature. 
Know risks from some type attack as 51% attack, double-spending, Sybil attack, 
DDoS attacks, repay attack, Attacks on cryptography and ways of protection.  
Having an experience in ICO project (in development period) base on stellar platform 
and ethereum platform. 
Can design data intensive applications guarantee reliable, scalable, and maintainable. I 
can design transaction having atomicity, consistency, isolation and durability. 
INTERESTS 
I like football, music and e-sport. 
PROJECTS 
Kaopiz Software Company  
(Feb 2018 – Present) 
Team 
Blockchain R&D team 
Description 
- Research blockchain technology. 
- Find out solution applying blockchain technology to solve real world problem.  
My position 
Developer 
 My responsibilities 
- Research blockchain technology. 
- Development. 
- Analysis and design prototype system applying blockchain technology. 
 Technologies used 
- Ethereum platform, Hyperledger Fabric platform, stellar platform, docker, go language, 
solidity language, node.js, truffle framework. 
FPT Global Automotive  
(Apr 2016 – Feb 2018) 
Customer  Korea 
Description 
- Application layer in embedded system for car. 
- Support 5 product lines using electric, petrol and hybrid. 
- Using open source library as persistence ... 
- Using agile software development. 
Team size 
30 
My position 
Developer, person in charge for home application and user profile manager application. 
My responsibilities 
- Analysis and design 
- Development 
- Review code 
- Optimize code 
- Bug Fixing 
Technologies used 
- QT 5.4, C++ 
- Open Embedded 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
